english.segment1: Stepping over two steps closer. I sit around wasting time, feel like the poster for a. Self-help line. Well me know the truth when we're older
english.segment2: For the first time in my whole life. I'm not afraid of feeling alive. For the last time I'm falling behind. And nothing out there will change me mind
english.segment3: Let's start over crimson clover. While those golden nights get colder
english.segment4: If I could I'd press rewind. Turn on record and leave the past behind. Will we know the truth when we're older
english.segment5: For the first time in my whole life. I'm not afraid of feeling alive. For the last time I'm falling behind. And nothing out there will change me
english.segment6: When you find me will you remind me. We're one step closer, two steps closer
english.segment7: For the first time in my whole life. I'm not afraid of feeling alive. For the last time I'm falling behind. And nothing out there will change me
english.segment8: For the first time in my whole life. I'm not afraid of feeling alive. For the last time I'm falling behind. And nothing out there will change me
english.segment9: For the first time in my whole life. I'm not afraid of feeling alive. This is the last time I'm falling behind. And nothing out there will change my mind.
